variables.name: chdir_path
variables.description: path to chdir to before running gunicorn (e.g. /home/<user>/domains/example.com/)

variables.name: virtualenv_path
variables.description: path to virtual environemnt, relative to chdir_path (e.g. ./env/)

variables.name: requirements_file
variables.description: path to requirements.txt file to use with pip (e.g. app/requirements.txt)
